concept.title: Elasticsearch
concept.shortdesc: The Elasticsearch destination writes data to an Elasticsearch cluster, including Elastic Cloud clusters (formerly Found clusters). The destination uses the Elasticsearch HTTP API to write each record to Elasticsearch as a document.

conbody.p: Elasticsearch destinationoverviewdestinationsElasticsearchWhen you configure the Elasticsearch destination, you configure the cluster name, the HTTP URI, and document-related information.
When the Data Collector shares the same network as the Elasticsearch cluster, you can enter one or more node URI and automatically detect additional Elasticsearch nodes on the cluster.
You can also add advanced Elasticsearch properties as needed.
